#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define itn int
#define mp make_pair
#define endl "\n"
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int mod = 1e9 + 7 ;
int powmod(ll a,ll b) {ll res=1;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;for(;b;b>>=1){if(b&1)res=res*a;if(res>=mod)res%=mod;a=a*a;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;}return res;}
ll gcd(ll a , ll b){return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b); }
int main()
{
	//ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int t,i,j,n,num;
	vector<int> vec;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int temp=n&(n-1);
		if(temp==0)
		{
			cout<<log2(n)-1<<endl;
			//cout<<"hel\n";
			continue;
		}
		
		//cout<<"n&(n-1)="<<temp<<endl;
		//int num=n;
		int msb;
		/*while(num>0)
		{
			vec.push_back(num%2);
			num=num/2;
		}*/
		int ans=1000000000;
		for(i=0;i<=31;i++)
		{
			if(n&(1<<i))
				msb=i;
		}
		//cout<<"msb="<<msb<<endl;
		int alice=1<<msb;
		int alicebit=0;
		int bob=n-alice;
		int bobmsb;
		for(i=0;i<=31;i++)
		{
			if(bob&(1<<i))
			{
				bobmsb=i;
			}
		}
		ans=max(msb,bobmsb+__builtin_popcount(bob)-1);
		for(i=msb-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			if(n&(1<<i))
			{
				alice+=(1<<i);
				alicebit++;
				bob=n-alice;
				if(bob==0)
					break;
				for(j=0;j<=31;j++)
				{
					if(bob&(1<<j))
						bobmsb=j;
				}
				ans=min(ans,max(msb+__builtin_popcount(alice)-1,bobmsb+__builtin_popcount(bob)-1));
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}

}
